Posts.EditableText: How can I uploaded a game with extension .gblorb to Quest, made in Inform?
Posts.HTML: How can I uploaded a game with extension .gblorb to Quest, made in Inform?

Posts.EditableText: If you use "Release along with an interpreter" (http://inform7.com/learn/man/doc394.html) Inform will create a web-playable version of your game. You can then zip up the folder and upload it.
Posts.HTML: If you use "Release along with an interpreter" (http://inform7.com/learn/man/doc394.html) Inform will create a web-playable version of your game. You can then zip up the folder and upload it.
